item.title: Colophon
item.description: A comprehensive dive into the design, and creation of this website Background This site was made to scratch an itch I long had. Sharing stuff on social media has never been my mojo, I’ll often post my photography, however I yearned for something more expansive and exciting so I made a website. The first version of the site was made by modifying what I felt was a suitable theme, however I soon became aware of my lack of knowledge in web design and development, scrapping the site soon after I finished it.
